name: MPTCE
tagline: The Myoelectric Personal Training and Control Environment
body:
### Welcome to the home page of MPTCE

MPTCE is a Windows application that aims to enable people to use surface electromyography data acquisition devices at home for biofeedback training.

#### Latest release (0.2)


* Download the [installer](https://github.com/mgcarmueja/MPTCE/blob/installer/v0.2/MPTCE_0.2.zip?raw=true) (64-bit only)

* Go to the [source code on GitHub](https://github.com/mgcarmueja/MPTCE/tree/0.2)

* Check out the [README](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mgcarmueja/MPTCE/0.2/README)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
